verses.text: Afterward he brought me \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and, behold, \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* issued \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from under the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w*: for the \w forefront|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add stood toward\add* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, and the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from under from the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, at the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \add side\add* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

Then brought he me \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, and led me \w about|strong="H5437"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* without unto the \w utter|strong="H2351"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w*; and, behold, there ran \w out|strong="H6379"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* on the \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w*.

And when the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that had the \w line|strong="H6957"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w*, he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and he brought me \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*; the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add were\add* to the \w ankles|strong="H0657"\w*.\f + \fr 47.3 \ft the waters were…: Heb. waters of the ankles\f*

Again he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and brought me \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*; the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add were\add* to the \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*. Again he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and brought me \w through|strong="H5674"\w*; the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add were\add* to the \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*.

Afterward he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*; \add and it was\add* a \w river|strong="H5158"\w* that I \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*: for the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* were \w risen|strong="H1342"\w*, \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* to swim \w in|strong="H7813"\w*, a \w river|strong="H5158"\w* that could not be passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*.\f + \fr 47.5 \ft waters to…: Heb. waters of swimming\f*

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add this\add*? Then he \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* me, and caused me to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w brink|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*.

Now when I had \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, behold, at the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \add were\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* on the one side and on the other.\f + \fr 47.7 \ft bank: Heb. lip\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, These \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* issue \w out|strong="H3318"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6930"\w* \w country|strong="H1552"\w*, and go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: \add which being\add* brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* shall be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.\f + \fr 47.8 \ft desert: or, plain\f*

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* every \w thing|strong="H5315"\w* that \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, which \w moveth|strong="H8317"\w*, whithersoever the \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: and there shall be a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* multitude of \w fish|strong="H1710"\w*, because these \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* thither: for they shall be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*; and every thing shall \w live|strong="H2425"\w* whither the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 47.9 \ft rivers: Heb. two rivers\f*

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* the \w fishers|strong="H1728"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* upon it from \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w* even unto \w En-eglaim|strong="H5882"\w*; they shall be a \add place\add* to spread \w forth|strong="H4894"\w* \w nets|strong="H2764"\w*; their \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* shall be according to their \w kinds|strong="H4327"\w*, as the \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* of the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*.

But the miry \w places|strong="H1207"\w* thereof and the \w marishes|strong="H1360"\w* thereof shall not be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*; they shall be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*.\f + \fr 47.11 \ft shall not…: or, and that which shall not be healed\f*

And by the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* upon the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* thereof, on this side and on that side, shall \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* all \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* for \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*, whose \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* shall not \w fade|strong="H5034"\w*, neither shall the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*: it shall bring forth new \w fruit|strong="H1069"\w* according to his \w months|strong="H2320"\w*, because their \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* they issued \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof shall be for \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*, and the \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* thereof for \w medicine|strong="H8644"\w*.\f + \fr 47.12 \ft shall grow: Heb. shall come up\f*\f + \fr 47.12 \ft new: or, principal\f*\f + \fr 47.12 \ft for medicine: or, for bruises and sores\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w This|strong="H1454"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, whereby ye shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* according to the \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \add shall have two\add* \w portions|strong="H2256"\w*.

And ye shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* it, \w one|strong="H0376"\w* as well as \w another|strong="H0251"\w*: \add concerning\add* the which I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: and this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* unto you for \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.\f + \fr 47.14 \ft lifted…: or, swore\f*

And this \add shall be\add* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*, from the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Hethlon|strong="H2855"\w*, as men \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Zedad|strong="H6657"\w*;

\w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, \w Berothah|strong="H1268"\w*, \w Sibraim|strong="H5453"\w*, which \add is\add* between the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*; \w Hazar-hatticon|strong="H2694"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Hauran|strong="H2362"\w*.\f + \fr 47.16 \ft Hazar-hatticon: or, the middle village\f*

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* from the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* shall be \w Hazar-enan|strong="H2703"\w*, the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*. And \add this is\add* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*.

And the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* ye shall \w measure|strong="H4058"\w* \w from|strong="H0996"\w* \w Hauran|strong="H2362"\w*, and \w from|strong="H0996"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and \w from|strong="H0996"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w from|strong="H0996"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add by\add* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, from the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* unto the \w east|strong="H6931"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. And \add this is\add* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*.\f + \fr 47.18 \ft from (Hauran, Damascus, Gilead, the land): Heb. from between\f*

And the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H8486"\w*, from \w Tamar|strong="H8559"\w* \add even\add* to the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w strife|strong="H4808"\w* \add in\add* \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*, the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* to the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. And \add this is\add* the \w south|strong="H8486"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*.\f + \fr 47.19 \ft strife: or, Meribah\f*\f + \fr 47.19 \ft river: or, valley\f*\f + \fr 47.19 \ft is the south side southward: or, is the south side toward Teman\f*

The \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* also \add shall be\add* the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* from the \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, till a man \w come|strong="H0935"\w* over \w against|strong="H5227"\w* \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*. This \add is\add* the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w*.
So shall ye \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* unto you according to the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* ye shall \w divide|strong="H5307"\w* it by lot for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* unto you, and to the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you, which shall \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you: and they shall be unto you as \w born|strong="H0249"\w* in the \w country|strong="H0249"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; they shall \w have|strong="H5307"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* with you \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* in what \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w*, there shall ye \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add him\add* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
